Class Vampire

java.lang.Object
HorrorCharacter
Vampire
All Implemented Interfaces:
Transformable
public class Vampire extends HorrorCharacter implements Transformable
Represents a Vampire character. A Vampire is a HorrorCharacter that can transform. Its attack and flee behaviors change depending on its transformed state.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class HorrorCharacter

    HorrorCharacter.Vulnerability

  • Constructor Details

    • Vampire

      public Vampire(String name, int health, HorrorCharacter.Vulnerability v)
      Constructs a new Vampire with a name, health, and initial vulnerability.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the vampire.
      health - The starting health of the vampire.
      v - The initial vulnerability of the vampire.

    • Vampire

      public Vampire()
      Constructs a nameless vampire.

  • Method Details

    • attack

      public void attack()
      Performs an attack. The attack's description changes based on whether the vampire is in its bat form (transformed) or human form.
      Specified by:
      attack in class HorrorCharacter

    • flee

      public void flee()
      Performs a flee action. The flee description changes based on whether the vampire is in its bat form (transformed) or human form.
      Specified by:
      flee in class HorrorCharacter

    • addVulnerability

      public void addVulnerability(HorrorCharacter.Vulnerability v)
      Adds a new vulnerability to the vampire's list of weaknesses.
      Parameters:
      v - The vulnerability to add.

    • transform

      public void transform()
      Transforms the vampire into its alternate form (a bat).
      Specified by:
      transform in interface Transformable

    • revert

      public void revert()
      Reverts the vampire from its bat form back to its human form.
      Specified by:
      revert in interface Transformable

    • isTransformed

      public boolean isTransformed()
      Checks if the vampire is currently transformed.
      Specified by:
      isTransformed in interface Transformable
      Returns:
      true if the vampire is in bat form, false otherwise.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the Vampire. Note: Prints to console instead of returning a formatted string.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      null.
